description: We are looking for a Senior Python / Django Developer to help us build out both our digital currency network and Website API.
responsibilities: Designing and creating RESTful APIs
Participating in architectural, design and product discussions
Working in an environment with an excellent team of engineers
technologyRequirements: Experience with Celery, DRF, and pytest

description: As Senior DevOps Engineer you will be a key contributor to designing, building, testing, managing, and maintaining some of the key technology that powers our digital currency network.
responsibilities: Analyze, troubleshoot and resolve system, software, network, and storage failures
Configure, test, deploy, and upgrade software for production services in AWS
Author and recommend settings for applications, operating systems, networks, and cloud services to improve performance, security, and reliability
Design and develop monitoring and 100% uptime solutions for our digital currency network
technologyRequirements: 3+ years experience with both software engineering and sysops or 6+ years experience as a DevOps engineer or similar
Extensive experience with cloud computing and virtualization
Proven understanding of networking (TCP/IP, DNS, etc)

applicationMethods.note: Message Kristy KJ Lee & David Yap

description: As a graphic designer, you will create high-fidelity graphics for our social media team and marketing team.
responsibilities: Create HiFi graphics for social media posts & marketing content
Give design reviews to community members making infographics
Review end results with design team
Send completed graphics to social media & marketing team for them to post
Be a part of creating our visual language

description: Work on the .NET Core SDK for thenewboston, code review the PRs opened by other contributors and participate in discussions about the architecture/direction of the SDK.
responsibilities: Contribute to the development of the .NET Core SDK
Code review the PRs of other contributors
Contribute to discussions about the structure of the project, code standards and development approaches

description: Social Media Managers are responsible for planning, implementing, managing and monitoring company's Social Media strategy in order to increase brand awareness, improve Marketing effort.
responsibilities: Develop, implement and manage our social media strategy
Define most important social media KPIs
Manage and oversee social media content
Measure the success of every social media campaign
Stay up to date with latest social media best practices and technologies
Work with copywriters and designers to ensure content is informative and appealing
Collaborate with Marketing Teams
technologyRequirements: Proven work experience as a Social media manager
Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research and Google Analytics

description: Someone with a good experience in translating business and technical requirements into comprehensive software design and architecture.
responsibilities: Designing and creating RESTful APIs
Designing and optimization of the database
Responsible for architectural, design of the product
Familiar with diagrams and documentations is a plus
Code review
technologyRequirements: Mainly a person who has a good skills in product designing to meet the best performance, scalability, and maintainability
Even if you are not experienced with Django, but you meet the main responsibilities, still DM me

description: Have a good experience in UI/UX standards
responsibilities: Design the web interfaces using Figma
Design pages from scratch based on requirements
Coordinate and take notes from other teammates
technologyRequirements: Knowledge of design systems is good to know

description: We are looking for a Data Entry Operator to update and maintain information on our Marketing Team database .
responsibilities: Maintaining accurate, up-to-date and useable information in our systems
Comply with data integrity and security policies
Keep information confidential
Research and obtain further information for incomplete documents
Compile, verify accuracy and sort information according to priorities to prepare source data for computer entry
Review data for deficiencies or errors, correct any incompatibilities if possible and check output
technologyRequirements: Proven data entry work experience, as a Data Entry Operator or Office Clerk
Experience with MS Office and data programs
Excellent knowledge of correct spelling, grammar and punctuation

description: As a front-end developer, your key contributions will be setting up the layout for the blog, removing bugs, integrating services like Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, managing the metadata of the website, etc.
responsibilities: Developing the front-end of the website
Managing the blog and clearing bugs
Posting blogs on a timely basis (Weekly)
Changing the blog layout if needed
The code should not be copy-pasted
Quality of code shall be high so that reduction in size is possible which will perhaps lead to faster load times
technologyRequirements: Shall be well acquainted with jQuery
Knowledge regarding Backend development is preferred

description: Blockchain Explorer team is looking for a backend developer to lead parts of the blockchain explorer from inception to launch, and own large parts of the product’s execution. They are one of thenewboston approved project with a mission to create Open Blockchain Explorer.
responsibilities: Lead parts of the blockchain explorer from inception to launch, and own large parts of the product’s execution
Planning out project and involved in database creation, integration, and management
Writing APIs and Data models for various features of the explorer
Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server side logic
Ensuring that systems are safe and secure against cybersecurity threats
Generating analytics and statistics for the explorer
Maintain comprehensive workflow documentation and knowledge sharing
Perform peer code reviews, create issues for other people outside the team could contribute to opensource project

description: Responsible for ensuring people are sending out payments as promised and other financial operations.
responsibilities: Conduct audit
Monitor completion of payments and resolve payment discrepancies
Communicate well with others

description: Responsible for providing project planning and resource management and ensuring that projects are completed to specification. Provide expertise and strategic advice on best practices and leverage change management principles to ensure project success.
responsibilities: Analyze, plan and develop requirements and standards in reference to scheduled projects.
Oversee subordinates are actively working toward established milestones.
Hold regular technical team meetings to determine progress and address any questions or challenges regarding projects.
Determine and define clear deliverables, roles, and responsibilities required for specific projects or initiatives.
Research and evaluate hardware and software technology options.
technologyRequirements: Master's degree in Project Management or related technical field required
Professional Project Management Certification from accredited institution preferred
Demonstrated understanding of Project Management processes, strategies, and methods
Experience in establishing guidelines in these areas for others
Strong sense of personal accountability regarding decision-making
Applying analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
Ability to predict challenges and seek to proactively head-off obstacles

description: Provide legal counsel to individuals who are deploying Blockchain-based solutions, creating or utilizing digital currencies, and helping individuals understand how existing laws and regulations apply to these new technological innovations. Assist those involved in cryptocurrency ventures to navigate the complex legal issues presented by Blockchain technology.
responsibilities: Finalize terms and agreements and policies to protect community members.
Advise the community against undesirable factors, including intellectual property.
Inform the community on taxation, regulations, and so on, at least for major markets.
Keeping track of agreements of digital currency exchange services.
Help the community understand use cases as smart contracts, implications in sensitive sectors (health etc.)
Advise community on how large traders will act/think - e.g., see all aspects of this https://redroadlegal.com/blockchain-crypto-asset-legal-consulting/
technologyRequirements: Fundamental Skills and Knowledge in Technical Field
Embracing Blockchain Expertise as a Service

description: Responsible for helping grow our network by researching leads and establishing relationships with potential partners. With strong interpersonal and communication skills, and experience in researching market trends, targeting relationships, and using proven methods to make business decisions.
responsibilities: Develop a growth strategy focused both on financial gain and customer satisfaction.
Promote the company’s products/services addressing or predicting clients’ objectives.
Developing a business development strategy focused on financial gain.
Research, locate, define and target key business prospects.
Create business development strategies; identify roadblocks and drive new business from conception through closure.

description: Responsible for developing and executing exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality as well as suggesting solutions to identified quality problems. Involved in planning and implementing strategies for quality management and testing.
responsibilities: Test and identify current product deficiencies
Suggest solutions to identified product problems
Investigate product quality to make improvements to achieve better customer satisfaction
Plan, create and manage the overall Quality Planning strategy
Collaborate with the Product Development team to ensure consistent project execution
Identify quality assurance process bottleneck and suggest actions for improvement
Oversee continuous improvement projects
Collect quality data
Identify key KPIs for product quality
Prepare and present reports and metrics to Senior Management
technologyRequirements: 2 years of experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer
2 years of experience with a variety of different testing techniques such as UI Testing, Automated Testing, Test Driven Development Strategies, and others
2 years of experience with coding using JAVA, HTML5, DB2, XML
2 years of experience with web security technology
2 years of experience with software QA tools and processes
A sense of ownership and pride in your performance

description: Provides administrative or community support through a variety of tasks related to organization and communication.
responsibilities: Provides administrative support to ensure efficient operation.
Ensure things are accomplished.
Carries out administrative duties such as organizing documents, answering questions and requests.
Organize meetings in Google Calendar.
